title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

of State at the Department of Health) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department health) order 2020

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 2. Noel Byrne, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Noel Byrne, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Health, Block 1, Miesian Plaza, 50-58 Lower 
Baggot Street, Dublin 2, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to Anne Rabbitte, 
Minister of State at the Department of Health with effect from 6 July 2020. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [597] 3

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

The purpose of this Order is to appoint a Special Adviser to Anne Rabbitte, 
Minister of State at the Department of Health 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [597]
